data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
The word عَنْهَا comes from the root ع ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word وَكَانُوا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word مِنْهُمْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word كَذَّبُوا comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.

data.meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.
data.sentence: The word فَانْتَقَمْنَا comes from the root ن ق م and is associated with the meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.

data.meanings: sank, drowned, went downwards and disappeared, became without need, drew the bow to the full (with vehement fulling), outstripped, engrossed, a man overwhelmed by trials, single draught, ornamented, obligatory
data.sentence: The word فَأَغْرَقْنَاهُمْ comes from the root غ ر ق and is associated with the meanings: sank, drowned, went downwards and disappeared, became without need, drew the bow to the full (with vehement fulling), outstripped, engrossed, a man overwhelmed by trials, single draught, ornamented, obligatory

data.meanings: sea, river, to aim at getting, to intend, to have recourse to, to resort to, to head for.
data.sentence: The word الْيَمِّ comes from the root ي م م and is associated with the meanings: sea, river, to aim at getting, to intend, to have recourse to, to resort to, to head for.

data.meanings: unmindful, forgetful, neglectful, heedless, intentionally neglecting or leaving or turning away
data.sentence: The word غَافِلِينَ comes from the root غ ف ل and is associated with the meanings: unmindful, forgetful, neglectful, heedless, intentionally neglecting or leaving or turning away
